strings: <Cap><leader> discovers a new recipe for the alchemy pot!
<Cap><string_1> <equal> <Cap><string_2> + <Cap><string_3>
<Cap><string_1> <equal> <Cap><string_2> + <Cap><string_3> + <Cap><string_4>

<se_def>*: Hm? Haven't seen you before.
New <IF_SOLO>recruit<ELSE_NOT_SOLO>recruits<ENDIF_SOLO>, are you?
<se_def>*: Well, you're not needed at present. Dismissed!

<se_def>*: You're one of the Templars, right?
If you're looking for Commander Marcello, he just went down.

<se_def>*: He looked a bit grim-faced as well.
Has something happened?

<se_def>*: Oi! I'm the gardener here!
Don't you go stompin' all over my lovely flowers!
<se_high>*: Tweet tweet tweet!
<se_high>*: Coo coo coo!
<se_def>*: This is the residence of His Holiness, the Lord High Priest.
<se_def>*: We'd give our lives to protect His Holiness!
<se_low>High Priest Rolo: So that confounded Marcello thinks he's too good to pay his bribes now that he's the master of the guard to the Lord High Priest!
<se_low>High Priest Rolo: He only got the position because of my personal recommendation!

<se_low>High Priest Rolo: The ungrateful swine!
When I become Lord High Priest, he'll soon see the error of his ways!
<se_low>High Priest Rolo: ...? Who are you!? Go away!

<se_high>*: I make food for everyone around here.
The Lord High Priest, the Templars and even the little birds.
<se_high>*: I'm always so busy that I've probably forgotten how to sit still by now!

<se_def>*: This is the Lord High Priest's chamber!
Make sure you behave properly!
<se_def>*: We're under Captain Marcello's orders to guard the Lord High Priest.

<se_low>Lord High Priest: ...Ah. The Goddess moves in mysterious ways.
I sense there is something special about you.

<se_low>Lord High Priest: Ha ha ha. Sorry. Did I surprise you?
Take no notice. It's just the nonsensical musings of an old man.
<se_low>Lord High Priest: May the Goddess be with you on your travels.
<se_high>*: Ah...phew...
<se_def>*: My...lovely...flower...uuh...

<se_def>*: The Lord High Priest has retired for the night!
If you want to see His Holiness, you'll have to come back tomorrow!
<se_high>*: Tweet!
<se_high>*: Tweet tweet! Tweet tweet!

<se_def>*: W-W-W-What was that!?
Did you see that hideous black beast!?
<se_def>*: Is the Lord High Priest safe!?
<se_def>*: What was that noise!? What's going on?

<se_def>*: I can't leave my post here!
You! Go and find out what happened!
<se_high>*: Waaah! Waaah!
<se_high>*: L-Lightning! I hate lightning! Waaah!
There's no response. He seems to be dead.
<se_def>*: You monster! I won't let you lay a finger on His Holiness!

<se_def>*: You don't stand a chance against it!
I'd clear off if I were you!
<se_def>*: How can Captain Marcello disappear at a time like this!?

<se_def>*: This can't be happening!
We should be protecting the Lord High Priest!
I'd give my life to keep His Holiness safe!

<se_low>Lord High Priest: What a sinister feeling...
By the Goddess! What is that beast!?

<se_low>Lord High Priest: Oh, Goddess! The guards are in danger!
Please! Help them!

<se_low>Lord High Priest: Sage...? What could it mean?
There's no time to think about that now!

<se_low>Lord High Priest: That black dog is no normal beast!
If we let it escape, it's sure to cause untold misery!

<se_low>Lord High Priest: I beg of you! Destroy it!
It must not survive to terrorise the world!
<se_def>*: Have you come to pay your condolences too?
<se_def>*: I still can't believe the Lord High Priest has passed away...
<se_high>*: Tweet tweet!
<se_high>*: Chirp chirp...
<se_def>*: I just can't seem to feel any enthusiasm about tending the garden any more. I don't know what to do...
<se_high>*: Did you come here to say a final farewell to His Holiness?
<se_high>*: He's lying in state upstairs. Please go on up and see him if you wish.
<se_high>*: I can't believe Marcello is going to be the next Lord High Priest!
<se_high>*: The High Priest and all of the other candidates are gone, but still... It just doesn't feel right.
<se_def>*: So now we have to bow our heads to that no-good, barrow boy thug!?
<se_def>*: Ooh, it makes me mad! MAD, I tell you!

<se_def>*: This is the Lord High Priest's residence.
In other words, it'll soon be Captain Marcello's mansion!
<se_def>*: I'm looking forward to Captain Marcello's safe return from his inauguration at the Holy Isle of Neos.

<se_def>*: Long live the new Lord High Priest, His Holiness, Marcello!
Huzzah! Huzzah! Huzzah!

<se_high>*: The Lord High Priest's coffin is upstairs.
Just take one of the staircases on the right or left and go on up.
<se_high>*: The official line is that the Lord High Priest slipped and fell when he was out walking...

<se_high>*: But I saw it! I saw his wound...
I saw that thing through his chest...
<se_high>*: There was something sticking right through him... He must have been in so much pain!
<se_def>*: If you wish to speak with our master, please take care to show him the respect he deserves.
<se_high>*: It seems that the Lord High Priest's last testament named Captain Marcello as his successor.
<se_def>*: I'd been supporting the High Priest as the potential next in line up to now, but...
<se_def>*: I never imagined he'd end up being shipped off to Purgatory Island for plotting to take His Holiness's life! Of all the things!

<se_low>*: Hm? What do you think you're doing here?
This room's in use! Now make <IF_SOLO>yourself<ELSE_NOT_SOLO>yourselves<ENDIF_SOLO> scarce!

<se_def>*: Have you come to pay your respects?
Then, go on through that door.
You'll find His Holiness's coffin in there.
<se_def>*: We were right to believe in Captain Marcello, and now his day has finally come. Long live the new Lord High Priest! Huzzah! Huzzah!
<se_high>*: His Holiness... Ohhh...!
<se_def>*: Apparently the new Lord High Priest, Marcello, found His Holiness's body.
<se_def>*: I heard that he had a hunch, went dashing down from the mansion, and set off on his horse like a bolt of lightning, trying to locate him.
<se_def>*: All that for a hunch... Rather odd, isn't it?
<se_def>*: I came to say a few words of greeting to the new Lord High Priest, but he doesn't appear to be here.
<se_def>*: I don't know, though. The funeral's only just over and already he wants his initiation ceremony. It seems a little impatient to me.
<se_low>*: May you rest in peace...
It's a beautiful coffin with exquisite decorations...
<se_high>*: ...I saw him. I saw Captain Marcello going into the Lord High Priest's bedchamber late at night.
<se_high>*: And then...not long afterwards...I heard His Holiness scream!

<se_high>*: N-No, it's nothing. It can't be!
That kind of thing is just unthinkable!
<se_high>*: Apparently there's this strange village surrounded by high mountains that's almost impossible to reach.

<se_high>*: I wonder if the little birds know where it is?
I'd love to go and see it if I ever had the chance.

<se_high>*: There was a b-black sh-shadow!
It went inside H-His Holiness's m-mansion!
<se_high>*: It's true, I swear! I saw it with my own eyes!
<se_high>*: High Priest Rolo is currently resting in this room.
<se_high>*: He can be rather overbearing, so it's worth watching how you speak to him.

<se_high>*: Pray tell me, what's for dinner? ♪
The diet of a sinner! ♫<page>*: It tastes like a winner! ♪
But it never makes you thinner! ♫

<se_high>*: Oh, have you come for a bite to eat?
There's an awful racket going on, isn't there?

<se_low>High Priest Rolo: Help! His Holiness is in danger!
An evil creature has forced its way into his chamber!
<se_low>High Priest Rolo: You have to help him!
<se_low>High Priest Rolo: And...don't forget to mention...
<se_low>High Priest Rolo: Tell His Holiness that it was High Priest Rolo who sent for help first!
<se_def>*: There was a constant stream of people coming to pay their respects before, but it's completely dried up since the sky turned all strange.

<se_def>*: I suppose it's understandable.
But it does seem a little cold.

<se_def>*: I'm a gardener, y'know.
No matter what happens, I have to take care of the flowers!
<se_def>*: Captain Marcello, or rather, the new Lord High Priest, will be returning soon.
<se_def>*: ...Very well! You don't appear to be too suspicious.
<se_def>*: If you've come to pay your respects to the old Lord High Priest, please make your way upstairs.

<se_high>*: Oh...! That red sky's so frightening!
Somebody help me...!
<se_high>*: Apparently His Holiness lost his footing on the cliff outside and fell.
<se_high>*: He went for a walk every day and fed bread to the little birds. Who'd ever have thought that would be the end of him...
<se_high>*: The official line is that the Lord High Priest slipped and fell when he was out walking...

<se_high>*: But I saw it! I saw his wound...
I saw that thing through his chest...
<se_high>*: There was something sticking right through him... He must have been in so much pain!
<se_high>*: ...I saw him. I saw Captain Marcello going into the Lord High Priest's room late at night.
<se_high>*: And then...not long afterwards...I heard His Holiness scream!

<se_high>*: N-No, it's nothing. It can't be!
That kind of thing is just unthinkable!

<se_def>*: Have you come to pay your respects?
Then, go on through that door.
His Holiness is lying in state through there.
<se_def>*: We're going to make Captain Marcello proud by doing an exemplary job of guarding the late Lord High Priest's coffin until he returns!

<se_high>*: I feel like this is the safest place to be.
I can feel the divine protection of His Holiness here.
<se_def>*: I think the sky turning red is some kind of sign from our sorely missed Lord High Priest. I'm convinced of it, in fact!
<se_high>*: Oh, Your Holiness...
<se_def>*: Captain Marcello personally ordered us to maintain high security here at the mansion. Not even a little slime will get past us!
<se_def>*: Hm? Who are you!?

<se_def>*: Huh! <IF_SOLO>A pilgrim<ELSE_NOT_SOLO>Pilgrims<ENDIF_SOLO>, eh?
If you've come to pay your condolences, go on upstairs.

<se_def>*: Have you come to pay your respects?
The Lord High Priest is lying in state upstairs.
<se_def>*: If it came to it, I'd throw down my hoe and take up arms to defend this mansion! Not to mention its garden!
<se_high>*: The sky's back to normal now, but it feels like that terrible colour's burnt onto my eyes, never to be forgotten.
<se_high>*: Why did it turn such a sinister red? Whose doing was it? And why doesn't the new Lord High Priest come back?
<se_high>*: His Holiness lost his footing on the cliff outside and fell... That's what I believed at first, anyway.
<se_high>*: But... Maybe he was THROWN over the cliff AFTER someone had already killed him!?
<se_high>*: Cleaning time, cleaning time...
<se_high>*: People say the large rock that the Lord High Priest's mansion is built on is held up by the power of the Goddess.
<se_high>*: It seems strange to think that His Holiness fell to his death from it... Ironic, really.
<se_def>*: Hm? Haven't seen you before.
<se_def>*: No doubt you're <IF_SOLO>an attendant<ELSE_NOT_SOLO>attendants<ENDIF_SOLO> from Trodain or Argonia?
<se_def>*: It's a right pain having to work this late, eh?
<se_def>*: So the wedding's rolled round at last. I can't wait to see Princess Medea all dolled up in her outfit tomorrow.
<se_def>*: It's late. You shouldn't be running around making a racket.
<se_def>*: We've got important people from Trodain on one floor and Argonia on the one above. And they're all trying to sleep!
<se_high>*: Ah, hello there, Commander! What are you doing up at this time of night? The Princess has already retired.
<se_high>*: The wedding's tomorrow. If you've come to say something to her, you're a bit late. I suggest you abandon the idea.
<se_high>*: The wedding's tomorrow. If you've come to say something to her, you're a bit late. I suggest you abandon the idea.
<se_low>Minister: Zzzz...
He seems to have fallen asleep sitting up.
<se_low>King Trode: Ah, <hero>! You did a splendid job of escorting the Princess, my boy!
<se_low>King Trode: But what are you still doing here? Your duties are complete now that she's arrived safely.
<se_low>King Trode: Why would you come and see me at this late hour...?
<se_low>King Trode: Never mind!
<se_low>King Trode: I've been doing my own share of thinking. About how best to make Medea happy...
<se_low>King Trode: I need some rest now, though. You should return to your lodgings as well. We have a big day ahead of us.
<se_low>King Trode: I need some rest now. You should return to your lodgings as well. We have a big day ahead of us.
<se_low>*: Hm? What is it? Oh, you're the chief of guards from Trodain, aren't you? The one who escorted Princess Medea here.
<se_low>*: Hm, I've got a feeling I'd met you somewhere before as well...
<se_low>*: Oh no! Of course! You're that traveller who escorted Prince Charmles to the royal initiation!?
<se_low>*: Goodness me! I implore you to keep that little episode to yourself! It would be mortifying for him if that got out!
<se_low>*: Who'd have thought it...!? I never imagined you were one of King Trode's retainers.
<se_low>*: I implore you to keep the details of Prince Charmles's initiation to yourself! It would be mortifying for him if that got about!

<se_def>Prince Charmles: ...Gurgh, Medea.
It's all right.
It's all right, I tell you...gurgh.
<se_low>King Clavius: It would throw the kingdom into turmoil if another heir appeared at this late hour. I cannot possibly recognise your claim.

<se_low>King Clavius: ...Please try not to think badly of me.
You must consider the subject closed.
Please leave now.
<se_low>King Clavius: What are you still doing here, hm?

<se_low>King Clavius: I have nothing more to say to you.
LEAVE!
<se_low>King Trode: Never fear. I shall use my diplomatic savoir faire and talk to Clavius, king-to-king, to smooth things over for you. Now stop dilly-dallying and get back to the inn!
